result.reason: mRemoteNG's VNC implementation, utilizing VncSharpCore, does not currently expose functionality for allowing multiple concurrent connections to a single TigerVNC server, leading to existing sessions being disconnected when a new connection is established.
result.approach: Investigate VncSharpCore.RemoteDesktop capabilities for shared VNC sessions. If such an option exists, implement a new property in ConnectionInfo.cs and integrate it into Connection.Protocol.VNC.cs to enable this functionality. If not, explore alternative VNC client libraries or custom handling to support multiple connections.
